title: Sex and Glory
description: Three tales of raunchy anonymous gay sex.Glory, Glory, HolelujahA young gay man, new to Toronto, has his first experience with a glory hole. (Graphic M/M sex, all participants 18+)Birthday at the BathhouseLuke's 20th birthday has been a bust. Will a visit to the local bathhouse change things? (Graphic M/M sex, all participants 18+)The CellarA young gay man frequents a bathhouse called "The Cellar" for his favorite sexual experience. But how will he react when offered a real relationship?(M/M sex, all participants 18+)
author: Lucian Carter
